sentences.en: "If you can stop the enzymes involved in that process with a small molecule or chemical," says Dunman, "that chemical could be an antibiotic.
sentences.cn: “如果能用一小分子或化学物质阻止这一酶的活性过程，”德明说，“这种化学物质就能够用来做抗生素。”

sentences.en: A new potent antibiotic will shortly be available.
sentences.cn: 一种新的高效抗生素不久将在市面销售.

sentences.en: An increasing number of bacterial skin infections are resistant to antibiotic medicines.
sentences.cn: 皮肤细菌感染的不断增加对抗生素类药会产生抗药性.

sentences.en: Antibiotic can be used against infection.
sentences.cn: 抗菌素可以用来防止感染.

sentences.en: Antibiotic ointments are useful for concurrent bacterial infections.
sentences.cn: 抗菌素软膏对伴发的细菌感染是有用的.

sentences.en: Antibiotic therapy for diffuse cellulitis should be aggressive.
sentences.cn: 弥漫性蜂窝织炎的抗菌素治疗应是强有力的.

sentences.en: Bacteria vary greatly in their sensitivity to the antibiotic penicillin.
sentences.cn: 不同的细菌种类对抗菌素青霉素的反应很不同.

sentences.en: Bacterial transposons carry genes encoding antibiotic resistance.
sentences.cn: 细菌转座子可以携带对抗生素的抗性基因.

sentences.en: Earthworms may produce antibiotic substances.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓可以产生抗菌物质.

sentences.en: If we all recognize that antibiotic resistance is one of the greatest threats to public health that we face today, we have to do something about this.
sentences.cn: 如果我们大家都能认识到耐抗生素（药性）已经成为我们今天面对的最大的公众健康威胁之一，我们就真的需要做点什么了。

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the effectiveness of non - antibiotic therapy for acute diarrhea.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨 非 抗生素疗法治疗肠道门诊急性腹泻的临床效果.

sentences.en: Our doctor diagnosed a throat infection and prescribed antibiotic and junior aspirin.
sentences.cn: 我们的医生诊断是喉部感染，并且开了一些抗生素和小剂量阿司匹林。

sentences.en: Thatreally sped up the development of penicillin as an antibiotic.
sentences.cn: 这确实加快了青霉素作为抗生素的发展。

sentences.en: The antibiotic activity and valency connect with transfer efficiency and dissociation constant.
sentences.cn: 抗菌活性和抗生素效力与能量转移效率和解离常数有关.

sentences.en: The appropriate antibiotic may subdue the initial organism.
sentences.cn: 适当的抗菌素可能抑制最初的细菌.

sentences.en: The doctor said that I should take some antibiotic.
sentences.cn: 医生说我应该服些用抗生素.

sentences.en: The efficiency of testing at the tanker level is why regulations require such testing for antibiotic residues.
sentences.cn: 在罐水平检测的效率是为什么条例要求这类抗生素残留检测的原因。

sentences.en: The most efficient antibiotic cannot compensate for inadequate and poor surgical technique.
sentences.cn: 最有效的抗菌素不能补偿不适当的粗劣的外科技术.

sentences.en: The polysaccharide Krestin possesses antibiotic property , anti - viral property, and anti - tumor property.
sentences.cn: 云芝多醣体具有抗微生物 、 抗 滤过性病原体和 抗肿瘤 的特性.

sentences.en: Your doctor may prescribe antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 你的大夫可能会开抗生素。

phrases.tran_cn: 抗生素抗性；抗菌素耐药性

trans.tran_en: a drug that is used to kill  bacteria  and cure infections
a drug that is used to kill  bacteria  and cure infections
